entry.content: Hi, my name is Masanori Ikeda, a Software Engineer specializing in backend and Salesforce development, and currently serving as a Team Leader in Sansan Data Hub group. In this post, I would like to share why Sansan Data Hub development excites me.

entry.title: Demis Hassabis & John Jumper awarded Nobel Prize in Chemistry | Google DeepMind Blog
entry.summary: The award recognizes their work developing AlphaFold, a groundbreaking AI system that predicts the 3D structure of proteins from their amino acid sequences.
